job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Job Description

Major purpose: This engineer will need experience in SW design, digital communications, modems, and FPGA design.


Areas of desired experience or education include:

• Forward Error Correction (FEC)

• Modulation

• Demodulation

• Digital filters

• Baseband sampling

• Acquisition

• Tracking Algorithms


Major functions: Technical/Functional skills: Education/Experience/Licenses etc.: Qualifications:

• Bachelor’s (Master’s preferred) degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering or Electrical Engineering.

• 4+ years of experience implementing complex modem algorithms in DSP software.

• 4+ years of equivalent experience in FPGA design with SW background will also receive consideration

• Preferred Skills:

• Expertise in C++ and object-oriented software design

• Expertise in software design for testability

• Expertise in laboratory debug techniques using digital scopes, logic analyzers, BERTS & other complex measurement equipment

• Experience with TI DSP BIOS RTOS is a plus.

• Familiarity with Git is a plus

• Familiarity with VHDL/Verilog and Matlab/Simulink is a plus
